Cell.Data: The DEV TEAM / MISC NOTES column contains info on what text between { } signs means (if applicable). It usually stands for either a numeric value, or a numeric value with an icon. Text between [ ] signs stands for a certain type of icon.
The Gravity Generator creates a concentrated gravitational anomaly around the colony, targeting hostile armies to impede their movement.
重力生成器能够在殖民地周围制造一片重力集中的异常区阻碍敌方军队的移动。

The Gravity Generator creates a concentrated gravitational anomaly around the colony, targeting hostile armies to impede their movement.[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet][abilityred]Enemy[/abilityred] movement cost within the colony domain is increased by {MovementCost} per hex on the world map.[/bullet][bullet]In combat:[/bullet][bulletList][bullet][abilityred]Enemy[/abilityred] units within the colony domain have [abilityred]Slow[/abilityred] movement speed.[/bullet]

重力生成器能够在殖民地周围制造一片重力集中的异常区阻碍敌方军队的移动。[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]在世界地图中：[abilityred]敌人[/abilityred]在该殖民地领域内的移动消耗提高，每个单元格将额外消耗 {MovementCost} 移动点数。[/bullet][bullet]在战斗中：[/bullet][bulletList][bullet]该殖民地领域内的[abilityred]敌方[/abilityred]单位将具有[abilityred]缓慢[/abilityred]移动速度。[/bullet]

Slow movement speed means the unit has less move points and moves slower on the world map. A hex has a movepoint cost(movement cost), and a unit has a number of move points. A unit spends movepoints equivalent to a hex's movepoint cost to move unto that hex.
The Targeting Array provides realtime firing solutions for the troops guarding the colony, increasing the accuracy of their weaponry.
瞄准阵列为保卫殖民地的部队提供实时射击解决方案，提高他们的武器准度。

The Targeting Array provides realtime firing solutions for the troops guarding the colony, increasing the accuracy of their weaponry.[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]Vision and sensor range for [abilityblue]friendly[/abilityblue] units within the colony domain are increased by {sensorRange}.[/bullet][bullet][abilityblue]Friendly[/abilityblue] units within the colony domain gain Detection.[/bullet][bullet][/bullet]

瞄准阵列为保卫殖民地的部队提供实时射击解决方案，提高他们的武器准度。[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]殖民地领域内的[abilityblue]友方[/abilityblue]单位的视野和传感器范围提高 {sensorRange}。[/bullet][bullet]殖民地领域内的[abilityblue]友方[/abilityblue]单位获得“侦察”。[/bullet][bullet][/bullet]
The Operation Scrambler pulses with emissions of jammer signals, making it impossible for hostile operations to be carried out effectively.
行动扰码器发散出来的干扰脉冲能使敌方行动无法有效进行。

The Operation Scrambler pulses with emissions of jammer signals, making it impossible for hostile operations to be carried out effectively.[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet][abilityred]Enemy[/abilityred] operations are not possible within this colony domain, both on the world map and in tactical combat.[/bullet]
行动扰码器发散出来的干扰脉冲能使敌方行动无法有效进行。[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]位于该殖民地领域中的[abilityred]敌人[/abilityred]无法在世界地图和战术战斗中施放行动。[/bullet]
The Pulse Defense Turret designates a kill zone around the colony by firing electromagnetic pulses at enemy cybernetic and mechanical units to disrupt and damage them.
脉冲防御炮塔能够在殖民地周围指定一片攻击区域，向敌人的神经机械和机械部队发射电磁脉冲，扰乱并伤害敌人。

The Pulse Defense Turret designates a kill zone around the colony by firing electromagnetic pulses at enemy cybernetic and mechanical forces to disrupt and damage them.[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]In combat within this colony domain, every {turns}[turn/] turns: [/bullet][bulletList][bullet]All [abilityred]enemy[/abilityred] Mechanical and Cyborg units suffer {TCdamage} [damagewave/] Arc damage.[/bullet][bullet][abilityred]Enemy[/abilityred] Mechanical and Cyborg units have a {Stunchance}[strengthwave/] strength chance to be [abilityred]Stunned[/abilityred] for {Stunduration}.[/bullet]

脉冲防御炮塔能够在殖民地周围指定一片攻击区域，向敌人的神经机械和机械部队发射电磁脉冲，扰乱并伤害敌人。[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]在该殖民地领域的战斗中，每 {turns}[turn/] 个回合：[/bullet][bulletList][bullet]所有[abilityred]敌方[/abilityred]机械和半机械人单位都会受到 {TCdamage}[damagewave/] 电弧伤害。[/bullet][bullet][abilityred]敌方[/abilityred]机械和半机械人单位有 {Stunchance}[strengthwave/] 力量几率被[abilityred]晕眩[/abilityred]，持续 {Stunduration}。[/bullet]
Mechanical and Cyborg are unit types, that determine whether or not some abilities and status effects can affect them. Stunned is a negative status effect that makes a unit unable to move or act.
The Aerial Denial System protects the airspace of the target colony, automatically targeting and harassing enemy airborne units.
空中管制系统能够保护目标殖民地的领空，自动瞄准和骚扰敌人的空中单位。

The Aerial Denial System protects the airspace of the target colony, automatically targeting and harassing enemy airborne units. [br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]In combat within the colony domain, every {turns}[turn/] turn: [/bullet][bulletList][bullet]A random [abilityred]enemy[/abilityred] Flying unit suffers {TCdamage} [damagephysical/]Kinetic damage and the Turbulence debuff for {turnsTurbulence} turns.[/bullet]

空中管制系统能够保护目标殖民地的领空，自动瞄准和骚扰敌人的空中单位。[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]在该殖民地领域的战斗中，每 {turns}[turn/] 个回合：[/bullet][bulletList][bullet]一个随机[abilityred]敌方[/abilityred]飞行单位将受到 {TCdamage}[damagephysical/] 动能伤害和“颠簸”减益效果，持续 {turnsTurbulence} 回合。[/bullet]
Turbulence is a negative status effect that affects flying units, making them less accurate with their attacks.
The Orbital Defense Relay provides defensive coverage for the colony, automatically engaging hostile units that are attacking friendly troops.
轨道防御中继站能够为殖民地提供防御遮盖，自动与攻击友军的敌方单位交战。

The Orbital Defense Relay provides defensive coverage for the colony, automatically engaging hostile units that are attacking friendly troops.[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]In combat within the colony domain, every {turns}[turn/] turns: [/bullet][bulletList][bullet]{units} random [abilityred]enemy[/abilityred] units suffer {TCdamage} [damagephysical/]Kinetic damage.[/bullet][bullet]Non-resistant units will become [abilityred]Staggered[/abilityred].[/bullet]

轨道防御中继站能够为殖民地提供防御遮盖，自动与攻击友军的敌方单位交战。[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]在该殖民地领域的战斗中，每 {turns}[turn/] 个回合：[/bullet][bulletList][bullet]{units}随机[abilityred]敌方[/abilityred]单位将受到 {TCdamage}[damagephysical/] 动能伤害。[/bullet][bullet]未抵抗的单位将被[abilityred]动摇[/abilityred]。[/bullet]
Stagger is a negative effect that can be applied to enemy units that means they are less effective.
The Shroud Generator projects a giant blanket of artificial, light-absorbing mist that hinders the visual senses of the enemy and conceals friendly forces.
隐蔽生成器能够投射出一片浓密的人造烟雾，妨碍敌人的视线并隐藏友方部队。

The Shroud Generator projects a giant blanket of artificial, light-absorbing mist that hinders the visual senses of the enemy and conceals friendly forces.[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]All [abilityred]enemy[/abilityred] units within the colony domain have {VisionRange} vision range while in this sector.[/bullet][bullet]In combat within the colony domain:[/bullet][bulletList][bullet]Enemy units without Detection have the maximum range of all of their abilities reduced to {WeaponRangeTC} hexes.[bullet/]

隐蔽生成器能够投射出一片浓密的人造烟雾，妨碍敌人的视线并隐藏友方部队。[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]所有位于该殖民地领域内的[abilityred]敌方[/abilityred]单位在该区域时获得 {VisionRange} 视野范围。[/bullet][bullet]在该殖民地领域内的战斗中：[/bullet][bulletList][bullet]不具备“侦察”能力的敌方单位，其所有技能的最远射程降低至 {WeaponRangeTC} 个单元格。[bullet/]
Vision range is how far a unit can see on the world map. It gets reduced in sectors affected by this operation.
Whilst this operation is sustained, this colony domain is under the protection of the imperial defense effect!
当该行动持续进行时，该殖民地领域将处于帝国防御效果的保护之下！
Sustaining refers to the operation being applied as long as upkeep costs are being paid, or until the operation gets cancelled.

In the text below, text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.

In the text below, any inserted strings - anything of the form {text} - is replaced by an integer value for the thing described in the brackets. If the {text} is not followed by a unit - e.g. shields, hitpoints - the icon for the unit is inserted together with the integer. The same holds for symbols - e.g. '+', '%' - which are occasionally inserted together with the integer.
For references to game terminology and in-world references, please check the glossary delivered as part of the documentation.
